segments.text: I see a typical kitchen scene, but there's trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing massively, sending water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman polishing the plate doesn't have a clue about the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a huge slipping hazard, especially with children around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And look at that boy on the stool, reaching for cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is clearly unstable; its legs are splayed out awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall at any second, perhaps landing in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him getting hurt makes me feel quite anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cookie jar is a clear sign of mischief in progress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to warn the adult about the dangers mounting around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for a domestic disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the splash of the fall and the crash of dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how oblivious she is to everything important happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
